title: COVID-19 vaccine used in clinical trials in China may be tested in Canada
description: A Chinese research team behind one of the few coronavirus vaccines already in clinical trials is collaborating with Canadian researchers to 'pave the way' for future trials in the country, according to the National Research Council of Canada.
